name: optional-unsigned
description: Represents an optional unsigned value in BACnet, allowing either a null or an unsigned integer.

options.name: null
options.description: Indicates the absence of an unsigned value.

options.name: unsigned
options.description: Specifies the unsigned integer value when present.
